name: Silent House RE
description:
You play as John Williams II, you were kidnapped in a public washroom. Now you’re stuck in a cage inside a house trying to escape the kidnapper duo. As you’re trying to escape you discover that the house has some hidden secrets…

  • Multiple Endings
  • PSX Graphics
  • Antagonist Duo
ControlsMovement
WASDInteractEInventoryISprintL ShiftCrouchL Ctrl
